Clear.day: The sky is a brilliant blue with barely a cloud in sight. The sun shines brightly, casting crisp shadows across the landscape.
Clear.night: The night sky is clear and filled with countless stars. The moon casts a gentle silver light across the landscape.
Clear.dawn: The first rays of sunlight streak across the horizon, illuminating a clear, promising sky.
Clear.dusk: The setting sun paints the clear sky with breathtaking hues of orange, pink, and purple.
Clear.default: The weather is clear, with bright sunshine and blue skies.

Cloudy.Light: A few fluffy white clouds drift lazily across the sky, occasionally passing in front of the sun.
Cloudy.Moderate: The sky is filled with a mix of white and gray clouds, allowing occasional patches of blue to peek through.
Cloudy.Heavy: Thick gray clouds blanket the sky, diffusing the sunlight into a dull, even glow.
Cloudy.default: The sky is overcast with clouds of varying thickness.

Foggy.Light: A light mist hangs in the air, giving everything a soft, dreamlike quality.
Foggy.Moderate: A fog has settled in, reducing visibility and muffling sounds. Objects beyond fifty paces appear as vague silhouettes.
Foggy.Heavy: A thick fog envelops everything, limiting visibility to only a few paces. Familiar landmarks have become strange and mysterious.
Foggy.Severe: An impenetrable wall of fog surrounds you, so thick you can barely see your own hand stretched out before you. All sounds seem distant and distorted.
Foggy.default: Fog has rolled in, reducing visibility.

Rainy.Light: A gentle drizzle falls, barely enough to dampen the ground but adding a fresh scent to the air.
Rainy.Moderate: Steady rain falls steadily from the gray sky, forming puddles on the ground and drumming pleasantly on rooftops.
Rainy.Heavy: Heavy rain pours down, forming rivulets that flow across the land. Thunder rumbles in the distance.
Rainy.Severe: Torrential rain hammers down, flooding low areas and making travel extremely difficult. The constant roar of rainfall drowns out most other sounds.
Rainy.default: Rain falls from the cloudy sky, dampening the ground.

Stormy.Light: A storm brews on the horizon. Dark clouds gather and occasional flashes of lightning can be seen in the distance.
Stormy.Moderate: The storm has arrived with steady rainfall. Thunder booms overhead and lightning flashes across the sky.
Stormy.Heavy: A powerful storm rages with howling winds and sheets of rain. Lightning tears across the sky and thunder crashes immediately after.
Stormy.Severe: A violent tempest has engulfed the area. Powerful winds bend trees, torrential rain reduces visibility to nearly nothing, and lightning strikes dangerously close.
Stormy.default: A storm rages with rain, thunder, and lightning.

Snowy.Light: Delicate snowflakes drift down lazily from the sky, barely beginning to dust the ground with white.
Snowy.Moderate: Snow falls steadily, accumulating on the ground and coating everything in a clean white blanket.
Snowy.Heavy: Thick snow falls heavily, muffling sounds and making travel increasingly difficult. The world is transforming into a white landscape.
Snowy.Severe: A heavy snowfall has blanketed everything in thick white. Drifts form in the wind, and traveling through the deep snow is exhausting.
Snowy.default: Snow falls from the gray sky, covering the ground in white.

Blizzard.Light: Snow falls heavily as wind begins to pick up, starting to reduce visibility and making the cold bite deeper.
Blizzard.Moderate: A blizzard has set in with driving snow and biting winds. Visibility is poor and the cold is dangerous.
Blizzard.Heavy: A fierce blizzard rages with howling winds driving snow horizontally. Visibility is severely limited and the cold is life-threatening without proper protection.
Blizzard.Severe: An extreme blizzard engulfs everything in white. The screaming winds and blinding snow make navigation nearly impossible, and the cold will kill anyone unprepared.
Blizzard.default: A blizzard rages with driving snow and fierce winds.

SandStorm.Light: The wind picks up, carrying dust and sand that stings exposed skin and gets into everything.
SandStorm.Moderate: A sandstorm approaches, reducing visibility and forcing you to shield your eyes and mouth from the blowing sand.
SandStorm.Heavy: A sandstorm envelops the area. The air is filled with stinging particles that reduce visibility drastically and make breathing difficult without protection.
SandStorm.Severe: A massive sandstorm has engulfed everything. The roaring wind drives walls of sand that scour exposed skin and make travel nearly impossible.
SandStorm.default: A sandstorm blows through the area, filling the air with dust and sand.

Heavy.name: Lightning Strike
Heavy.description: A brilliant flash of lightning strikes nearby, followed immediately by a deafening clap of thunder that shakes the ground.

Heavy.name: Flooding
Heavy.description: The heavy rainfall has caused low-lying areas to flood, making certain paths impassable.

Severe.name: Lightning Strike
Severe.description: Lightning forks down from the sky with alarming frequency, striking dangerously close.

Severe.name: Flash Flood
Severe.description: A wall of water suddenly rushes through, carrying debris and flooding everything in its path.

Heavy.name: Strange Sounds
Heavy.description: Eerie sounds echo through the fog, distorted and impossible to locate. Something moves in the mist just at the edge of vision.

Heavy.name: Lost Path
Heavy.description: The thick fog has obscured all landmarks, making it easy to become disoriented and lost.

Severe.name: Avalanche Risk
Severe.description: The heavy snowfall has made slopes unstable. Loud sounds might trigger an avalanche in certain areas.

Severe.name: Frostbite Warning
Severe.description: The combination of extreme cold and wind makes frostbite a serious risk for any exposed skin.
